description: Security enforcement configuration - can be adjusted gradually

enforcement.comment: Options: 'warning' (logs issues but allows commit) | 'error' (blocks commit) | 'disabled'

test_coverage.description: Start with 50% minimum, gradually increase to 70%

unprotected_endpoints.description: API endpoints should have rate limiting or auth

sensitive_data_logging.description: Never log sensitive data like private keys

escalation_schedule.week_1_4: All rules at 'warning' level - learn the system
escalation_schedule.ongoing: Regular review and adjustment based on team feedback
